sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"drupal-8"}}>{`Drupal 8`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#drupal-8"}}>{`Drupal 8`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#installation"}}>{`Installation`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#basics-of-content-creation"}}>{`Basics of Content Creation`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#publishing-options---published-promoted-url"}}>{`Publishing Options - Published, Promoted, URL`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#5-simple-site---content"}}>{`5. Simple Site - Content`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#8-extending-drupal"}}>{`8. Extending Drupal`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#core-modules"}}>{`Core Modules`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#forum-module"}}>{`Forum module`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#finding-modules"}}>{`Finding modules`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#9-creating-a-site---content-types"}}>{`9. Creating a site - Content Types`}</MDXTag><MDXTag name="ul" components={components} parentName="li">
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#updating-an-existing-content-type"}}>{`Updating an existing content type`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#changing-how-the-content-type-displays"}}>{`Changing how the content type displays`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#create-a-new-content-type---event"}}>{`Create a new content type - Event`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"installation"}}>{`Installation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Download Drupal: `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://www.drupal.org/download"}}>{`https://www.drupal.org/download`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Save the contents at the base of your new repo/directory i.e. so the url will be `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`localhost/YOUR_DIRECTORY/DRUPAL-CONTENT/`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Go to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`localhost/YOUR_DIRECTORY/DRUPAL-CONTENT/`}</MDXTag>{` and follow the prompts
You also need to run `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`composer install`}</MDXTag>{` from your sites root directory.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basics-of-content-creation"}}>{`Basics of Content Creation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`What we deal with out-of-the-box. Content entry being the most important.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Using `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Content > Add content`}</MDXTag>{` to get a list of content that we can add.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If we create a page `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`About`}</MDXTag>{` and change the settings on the right hand side, we can also begin to add tables for quick access.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"publishing-options---published-promoted-url"}}>{`Publishing Options - Published, Promoted, URL`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If we create an article without the default settings, we can then use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`saved as unpublished`}</MDXTag>{` from the save and publish dropdown. If content is not published, you'll be redirected to a login from a private browser and not allowed to use.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`On the right-hand side options, we can also edit things out of the box such as comments, the url path, author info, promotion options as well as the previously explored comment settings. Promotion options also allow you to deal with `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`sticky-at-top-of-list`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"5-simple-site---content"}}>{`5. Simple Site - Content`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"8-extending-drupal"}}>{`8. Extending Drupal`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"core-modules"}}>{`Core Modules`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Two types: `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`core`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`contributed`}</MDXTag>{`. Contributed is given back from the community. It's not maintained by the community.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Under the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`manage > extend`}</MDXTag>{` tab, you can manage the modules. Selecting them on or off and seeing more information is available from here.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Extra configuration may be available from the accordian dropdown.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"forum-module"}}>{`Forum module`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can also manage permissions from the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`people`}</MDXTag>{` section. If you have modules installed, you can see from the accordian dropdown what is required for it to work.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If modules themselves are enabled, they may become directly available on the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`content`}</MDXTag>{` menu.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"finding-modules"}}>{`Finding modules`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We can search drupal.org and search for modules.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"9-creating-a-site---content-types"}}>{`9. Creating a site - Content Types`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"updating-an-existing-content-type"}}>{`Updating an existing content type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`What happens if we want to add a field for articles if we want to add photo credit? If you are building a site for someone else, take them into account.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`From `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Structure > Content Type`}</MDXTag>{` you can select the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Manage fields`}</MDXTag>{` dropdown to edit existing types and what we can easily view. To add something such as a new field, we need to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`manage fields`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`As we update the field names, we can see the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`machine name`}</MDXTag>{` on the left updating - this is important for the database itself.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The next step is asking for global settings themselves.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Next, we can add help text, add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`required`}</MDXTag>{` and a default value.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"changing-how-the-content-type-displays"}}>{`Changing how the content type displays`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`From `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Structure > Content Type`}</MDXTag>{`, we can change the display.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"create-a-new-content-type---event"}}>{`Create a new content type - Event`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
